name: Maze Escape - Pandemic Infection
description:
Outbreak of a new virus spread that is causing the infected to be come extremly vicius.

Most people have not escaped and or become infected.

After you managed to get a weapon, you were trapped in a maze.

Kill everything that is infected and get out of the maze.

Escape from the maze without being infected.

Good luck.

WASD - Moving

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Aim

R - Reload

Q - Slowmotion

Shift - Run

Left CTRL - Crunch

Space - Jump
